name: Polymer Clay Sushi Necklace, Bracelet or Earrings
description:
A must have for the sushi lover, this jewelry shows off your interest in unique style!

NECKLACE:

Silver chain, notched clasp with 12 mixed sushi, 1 crystal, 1 fish charm.

The collection includes futomaki, California roll, maguro (tuna), sake (salmon), tamago (egg), tako (octopus), uni (sea urchin), ikura (salmon roe), umeboshi (plum) musubi, spam musubi, and more.

The sushi beads are handmade from polymer clay and coated with a clear varnish. All of the colors are the clay itself, not painted on. Each bead measures between .375-.5" long.

Please note that because they were individually handmade, your items may vary slightly from the photo.

This necklace is approximately 24” long.

BRACELET:

The collection includes futomaki, California roll, umeboshi musubi, spam musubi, and more – accented by black beads and gold spacers.

This bracelet is approximately 7.5" long with clasp.

EARRINGS:

Futomaki on silver color studs.

name: Polymer Clay Spam Musubi Necklace, Bracelet or Earrings
description:
Specially made for the spam musubi lover!

NECKLACE:

Silver chain, lobster clasp with a spam musubi and pink crystal.

The beads are handmade from polymer clay and coated with a clear varnish. Each bead measures approximately .5" long.

Please note that because they were individually handmade, your items may vary slightly from the photo.

This necklace is approximately 20" long.

BRACELET:

This bracelet features spam musubi and is accented with pink beads and silver spacers.

Approximately 7.5" long with clasp.

EARRINGS:

Spam musubi on silver color studs.

name: Polymer Clay Sushi Magnet
description: This magnet features a platter of futomaki accompanied by wasabi and pickled ginger. It’s handmade from polymer clay so your magnet may vary slightly from photo. Measures approximately 1" square.
